title: Lol another chat ban
body:
My god, this system is seriously fucked. Another chat ban going to me for the most basic shit said. 

Game 1
Pre-Game
Kimblee: 2 sylas
In-Game
Kimblee: small leash if possible
Kimblee: ty
Kimblee: he backed out
Kimblee: why stay
Kimblee: another loss
Kimblee: jesus
Kimblee: duide throw a q
Kimblee: lol you 1vs1 an aatrox
Kimblee: dont be bad
Kimblee: sigh
Kimblee: can you guys just not die? its 5 mins in
Kimblee: or  take them
Kimblee: gl in game
Kimblee: lol
Kimblee: the feed
Kimblee: because you are shit
Kimblee: you cant get it
Kimblee: why would i leave it
Kimblee: sigh
Kimblee: olaf
Kimblee: take top
Kimblee: the fuck you doing
Kimblee: ff it, they are just a better team
Kimblee: lol fucking troll kat
Kimblee: rather lose the game
Kimblee: after i carried her dumbass
Kimblee: such shit xD
Kimblee: report kat, shes toxic af
Kimblee: you guys dont ward
Kimblee: dont clear wards
Kimblee: dont engage
Kimblee: lmao
Kimblee: fuck it im done
Kimblee: i was in 4 of 6 kills
Kimblee: hows that not participating? lol
Kimblee: 0/3
Kimblee: 2/4
Kimblee: nah im done
Kimblee: okay
Kimblee: for?
Post-Game
Kimblee: lol chat logs dont lie
Kimblee: you harassed me since you 1vs1 aatrox level 2 and lost
Kimblee: whew only lost 10 lp for playing with you guys
Kimblee: maybe you will learn now
Kimblee: ward
Kimblee: clear wards
Kimblee: engage
Kimblee: dont loss your shit at the jungler when you suck
Game 2
In-Game
Kimblee: yessir
Kimblee: ....
Kimblee: yay no remake
Kimblee: gotta lvoe this game
Kimblee: cant farm
Kimblee: sigh
Kimblee: its done
Kimblee: literally just locked behind tower as he shoves
Kimblee: because no one goes sion mid?
Kimblee: said he was top
Kimblee: nah its done, plenty of time to gank
Kimblee: he took 3 turret hits
Kimblee: 36-14 farm lol
Kimblee: see
Kimblee: game
Kimblee: i warend
Kimblee: it was warded
Kimblee: noit my fault yall dont pay attention
Kimblee: see im fine, sion is just a dick
Kimblee: sigh
Kimblee: can we ff
Kimblee: because everyone is fed lmao
Kimblee: LMAO
Kimblee: you have 9 death total bot lane
Kimblee: your lane has HALF of the teams entire deaths
Kimblee: gl with your game
Kimblee: lol wtf did i do to you amumu?
Kimblee: yay
Kimblee: aw
Kimblee: yay
Post-Game
Kimblee: yea maybe you should watch mini map lol
Kimblee: did better than yall bot xD


That top game, right before the part where i said you 1vs1d aatrox...was a kat dying 1vs1 in river to aatrox then FLAMED harder than anyone i have ever seen. "Fuck you" "Learn to fucking play" "%%%%%%" "typical bitch jungler". They kept feeding, they kept talking, they kept harassing so I was finally done...and thats what happens? I get chat banned for 24 games? lmfao. 

Also what the hell is that last game? By just my chat you can see that they were the ones talking shit. What was bad in that game? We had an afk that bought items so no remake, said it was done because of the 4vs5 but did not int anything. Actually did well towards the end of the game. Is that really what dictates harassment now? 

I guess with league just keep your fucking mouth shut no matter how hard someone screws you.
